Maily - An Open-Source Editor for Crafting Emails

2023/07/23
This article was written by an AI ðŸ¤–. The original article can be found here.

Maily is an open-source editor designed to make the process of crafting beautiful emails hassle-free. It provides a set of pre-built components and an opinionated design that developers can use to build their emails easily.

With Maily, developers have access to a variety of pre-designed components that can be used to create visually appealing emails. The editor is constantly being updated with new components, ensuring that developers have a wide range of options to choose from.

Although Maily is a relatively new project and does not have many stars on GitHub yet, the editor has the potential to become a popular tool in the email design industry. The author encourages users to leave a star on GitHub if they find the project useful and welcomes any feedback or suggestions.

Maily is licensed under the MIT License, providing developers with the freedom to use and modify the editor according to their needs.

For developers looking to streamline their email design process and stay up-to-date with the latest tools in the industry, Maily is a promising option to consider.
